data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Ninawa, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ninawa, Iraq
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 654 new simple churches in the state of Ninawa, Iraq. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,270,400 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Ninawa. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Ninawa prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kurd, Kurmanji people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Ninawa, Iraq, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ninawa, Iraq a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,690 believers in Ninawa, Iraq a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Ninawa
location.cities_list: Al Mawşil al Jadīdah, Mosul, Al-Hamdaniya, Sinjār, Tallkayf
location.cities_list_w_pop: Al Mawşil al Jadīdah (2,065,597), Mosul (1,739,800), Al-Hamdaniya (50,000), Sinjār (38,294), Tallkayf (23,524)
